album.title: The Very Best Of Sting And The Police

wiki.content: According to Songfacts, this song is about a teenager who commits suicide when he loses his girlfriend. It took Sting only a few minutes to write the lyrics. They are not supposed to be deep and meaningful, but more of a joke. This was the first Police song to chart. It hit #42 in England when it was released in 1978. A year later, after The Police became widely known, it was re-released and went to #2. Go to http://www.songfacts.com/detail.php?id=1418 for more info on "Can't Stand Losing You." User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

A year later, after The Police became widely known, it was re-released and went to #2.
